WRITING.TEXT: totally agree

Thats's a tough situation to be in. I completely understand your point of view, as I would feel completely the same. Anyone who had molested someone or had sexually abused someone in the past, is something that I could never come to terms with and would definitely not be friends with that person. To be honest if your boyfriend really cares about you then he will do whatever it takes to make you feel comfortable. It is probably a question of whether his friendship with this person is more important to him than your relationship with each other. I think you should talk things over as considering your past experience with abuse (I am truly sorry that you had a traumatic experience and I know that it can truly hurt you from personal experience) it is clearly very important for you and I hope your boyfriend will understand that your feelings are worth taking into consideration.

Yes, you should be in an environment where you are safe and have the support from others. If your family are willing to ignore the fact that you had been a victim of abuse and still try to include that person in your life then they are clearly not looking out for you. It's hard to turn your back on your family but if it's the best thing for your well-being then I would do it.

I'm in the same situation at the moment. Whenever I feel slight happiness a shadow is cast upon it and I feel worthless again and end up harming myself. I've been having so many breakdowns lately because I don't really know how I can feel better about myself and about life in general. Mental health sucks. Currently going to be turning 19 soon and have been having suicidal thoughts since I had been 15. Lately the urge has become stronger because I feel like I have nothing to live for and I keep going aroung in circles with self-harm and my issues seem to be getting worse by the day. I try to stay strong sometimes and tell myself that it will get better and I that I will find my purpose in life but my hope is fading away.
Awesome! See that you're using mtn 94's nice choice!

I been angry for years too so completely understand where you're coming from. No matter how hard I try I always end up fucking things up and getting so pissed off at myself. I used to hit myself all the time and hit my head against walls/anything solid. I've literally become so used to my anger that I can't imagine living without it. Maybe find an outlet for your anger. I have been advised to take up boxing so many times which I am still yet to do. Or maybe start to learn an instrument, that helps me when I'm angry. Playing the guitar can be very soothing.

Feel for you man. Had depression since 15 and now I'm 19 and currently at uni. It's the worst shit ever. There are times where I just shut myself in my room and don't talk to anyone. It's quite hard to avoid people though since I'm in shared accomodation, but at least I have my own room and only share the kitchen and bathroom areas. Maybe you should reach out to someone, it doesn't have to be therapy. Personally, I don't think therapy helped in anyway but I was literally forced to go because I was on the verge of getting kicked out of uni if I wasn't going to improve. Still, I refuse to go and been keeping more to myself now which probably isn't a good idea because I've been self-harming a lot and been suicidal lately. You need to find something that helps, even if it's just talking to a friend. Sometimes I just end up writing shit down when I'm really depressed and it helps a bit. It's frustrating though, I understand.
Literally me all the time lately.
I'm just proud to get past each day. Everyday I wake up and know that it's going to be a struggle.

It's so hard to dig yourself out of that hole. Lately I feel like I've lost all hope at life and I really struggle to convince myself to live. Same here, at our uni someone committed suicide recently. It just makes you realise how short life really is. I think most people take life for granted (me included.) I try to stay positive at times but it doesn't last long and then I become withdrawn and sucidal again. I feel like I have no friends as well, which makes me upset, then I just become self-destructive because I think that no one will give a shit about what happens to me anyway.

Sorry to hear what you had been through, it must have been so difficult. You shouldn't be forced to mantain a relationship with your step-brother if you're not comfortable with it. At the end of the day he abused you and doesn't have any right to be involved in your life since he caused trauma to it. Your actions are completely the right thing to do, as if I was in your position I would do the exact same thing. If you are concerned about your daughter's safety then you should take all measures to protect her. It's completely your choice who is allowed to have your daughter's pictures. Your step-brother (abuser) has no right to comfront you because he was the one in the wrong when he abused you in the past. I would just completely ignore him and if need be take measures to ensure that you are safe. The fact that your parents are indenial with what your step-brother had done to you just proves that they are trying to make your life toxic. No one should ignore abuse no matter who is involved.
Currently in the same situation

I know! Sometimes I convince myself that I'm gonna cut my wrists deep enough to bleed out but I know that it's going to be so painful. Failing suicide is probably the worst thing because then you get stigma from all sorts of people. At least if you commit suicide correctly you don't have to take any judgements from others.

This happens all the time with me. I feel like everyone hates me and that their life would be better without me in it. That's why there are times when I just isolate myself and withdraw completely because I know that people think that I'm a waste of space.

Literally me all the time. I completely isolate myself from the world, then when I finally have the urge to reply to people's messages after days they ask me if I'm okay. It's like I can't even explain what's wrong, so I just say I'm fine. I feel like I'm just sad all the time now even when I'm around people. Not sure what my life has come to.
That's good to know that someone really cares about you. Unfortunately I don't feel the same way and think that I won't be missed anyway.
Same I wanna disappear and see if anyone actually notices. Wherever I am I always have the urge to runaway and never come back because I feel like nobody likes me and I ruin everything.

Even though what happened to me was wrong, up until I realised it was it sort of became a norm to me. Sometimes, I do miss that feeling of being given that attention but also it was very uncomfortable. I've always had a question of safety after it had stopped and it haunts me to know that I will never feel safe anywhere I go.

Same, I've been on self-destruct mode for a while now. Can't stop SH and losing slight control over it. Haven't been eating well or sleeping well. I seem to shut down friendships all the time because I have so many fucked up mental problems and I have issues with close relationships ( friends/family). Also I keep messing everything up, had so many warnings about being kicked out of uni and at this rate feel like I'm going to fail my exams. I've been suicidal for a number of years but it's got to a point where I can't do anything right in my life and nothing seems to be improving, so sometimes I think what's the point even trying to fix things when I'll end up messing them up again.

Going through the same shit right now. My life is so pointless and I feel like I isolate myself away from people, so I can't really maintain a lasting friendship. Wanted to kill myself on my fucking birthday (which is today btw) and already cut today but was too scared to cut deep enough to bleed out. I'm just tired of being alive when I have nothing to look forward to and that my life just revolves around SH.

If you ever want to talk, then I'm here. I feel like no one actually understands me and when people say I know what you're going through, I just get so angry. It upsets me to know that I have no one to talk to about my issues without people being judgemental.
Thank you :) couldn't actually commit suicide. I think a part of me wants to live on. I guess I'm just going to have to keep struggling

Same here, I've been suffering from mental illness for a long time now and it never gets better. I feel like I don't even have 'good days' anymore, like everything is just pointless and I have breakdowns all of the time. It's so hard to struggle and go through the same shit everyday when I know that I've hit a wall and nothing is going to change. Families are always affected though, and especailly if I had a child I wouldn't want to hurt them and make their life a misery knowing that their parent is gone. Maybe try to spend more time with your daughter to keep you preoccupied and see what you would miss out on.

The only reason I'm still alive is because I don't want to hurt my mum. I planned to kill myself yesterday but couldn't because I kept thinking that my mum would be so upset. I know one day I'm going to commit suicide because I've been suicidal since 15 and the urge gets stronger all the time. For me suicide almost feels 'normal' because I've been hurting for so long and it's the hardest thing to carry on with an empty life. I'm constantly SH (even twice today) and that's what gets me through the day. I cry almost everyday, because I want to feel better but I know that it's not possible and that I'm slowly fading away. Thinking of my mum makes me upset because I don't want her to suffer from my actions.

This is a constant battle for me. I managed to have a shower today, but haven't washed my hair for a while though, I can't get myself to do that. Maybe think of it as calming and stress relieving. That's what motivates me.
Same for me. I always question my safety, because I'm always scared that something is going to happen again. I wish that I didn't have to worry about things like that.
WELL DONE! Can't say the same for me though, haven't brushed my hair for two weeks now :(
Thanks for motivating me. I might get myself to do it tomorrow :)

Same here. I do this thing where I just completely shut down from people and ignore their messages and calls. I don't do it on purpose but I think it's just a reaction from me not being okay. I have so much shit to deal with and things get too much for me, so pushing people away and shutting down is probably the way I tell people that I'm not okay. My friends message me asking if I'm okay and that we should hang out soon, and I get upset because my problems always seem to take over and then I lose friendships. I'm hurting so much inside and people don't notice how bad it gets. When people tell me all the time that things are going to get better it frustrates me because I know that I always go through the same cycle and things never seem to be alright.
I think about this all the time. It saddens me that they won't be able to help me because I've been suicidal for a number of years and the urge gets stronger. I wonder how they would cope...
Same, I don't think I will even turn up to my exams :( I'm just struggling so much.

So true. It's like each time I think I'm getting better I may start talking to people for a day. Then it suddenly gets worse again and I isolate myself again. It's so annoying because my 'friends' say why you ignoring me and then I just end up hating myself. Same, I used to be able to having a lasting friendship before my life went to shit and I haven't been able to maintain friendships for a number of years now. It's like I meet someone new and become close with them but then I start having issues again and breakdowns and ultimatley mess up that friendship which I wish I could sustain.

One is on the 28th May and the other 6th June. I can't even concentrate on studying because I'm in a really shit point in my life and keep having breakdowns. I'm becoming more and more suicidal because I can't cope anymore with anything :(

Right now I'm pretty much depressed all the time, but it mainly occurs at night. Probably because I'm an insomniac, which means I have more time to think about things which gets my mood down. I try to distract myself but there's only so much that I can do .

You've basically just summed up all of my friendships. I'm such hard work and I feel like people put a lot of effort into becoming my friend. They soon realise that I have issues and always say that they'll be there for me and that I can talk to them. It doesn't even make me happy to know that someone wants to be there for me because I know that they won't be able to deal with me and that the friendship is going to fade away. Then I feel like I can't even reach out to them because I feel like I fucked everything up and that they will not interested in dealing with me anymore. I've come to the conclusion that I'm never going to have a healthy relationship with anyone because I always ruin them.

Likewise, it's so hard to live like this. I act like I'm trying but everyday I just want my life to end. What's the point living when you're not happy and know that you never will be. People keep telling me that it's going to get better which breaks my heart even more because they don't get it. I'm sick of acting like I'm actually improving but it's better than explaining to people that I've hit rock bottom once again. I think I'm so used to deceiving people by now, that it;s just the norm for me. Sorry to hear about your dog, it's so hard to let go of a pet. I have a dog that's 9 and I get upset thinking that he's not going to be around for much longer. Dogs are better friends than humans will ever be!

Same, it frustrates me so much because I can't even take a break from my thoughts. I'm constantly in the need to runaway from everyone and everything because it gets too much for me to handle. Happiness for me seems obsolete.
Your comment made my day :)

That's a good alternative! I should try that next time. I've gotten so angry lately that I've hit my head against walls which really fucking hurts. It's so hard to get rid of habits though, but I need tp start because I'm damaging my body.
I wish had the courage to do that. Can I ask what they said?
Same for me. The only way I get through the day is by SH. I'm tired of it though, I just want to die.

Same. Whenever I'm upset or overwhelmed emotionally I normally end up self-harming. Then I buy something to make me feel better, which inevitably cheers me up. But it only lasts for a certain period of time until I feel shit again. I think i waste a lot of money on shit that I don't necessarily need which makes me feel bad. I think it's just a cycle that I'm used to by now. Not really sure how to change that habit.
I can relate. I'm constantly on self-destruct mode and I feel like it's actually getting worse.
I now identify as a cat...

Same here, I just tend to stay in my room all of the time and have to force myself to go outside. It's got to the point where I don't want to wake up in the morning because I know that nothing has changed and I feel like shit all the time. I just want to hide forever...

Honestly, I'm in my first year of uni and I didn't think I would make it this far. I still feel like I won't make it to the next academic year. It's such a struggle to always have that thought at the back of your mind because I then lose interest in things that I enjoy because I feel like what's the point, I'm not going to be alive for much longer anyway. I'm currently studying Film, and I potentially want to be a film director or work in production but I still have those feelings that I'm going to end up killing myself. Feel like I'm throwing away my studies at the moment, and my suicidal thoughts have taken over. It's so shit to have to think like this all of the time.
Self harm
I can relate. Once you know that you have been abused you start to question everything.

Same here. I keep going but I'm literally empty inside. If you try to commit suicide and not succeed then I feel like you'll be left with that stigma. At least I'm treated somewhat normal for now, but I don't know how long I can keep it up for.
Same. I try to block out the thoughts, it helps a lot. I love that song it's so relatable :)

I'm like this because I'm scared that someone will hurt me again. Since I was sexaully abused I feel like I'm scared to find myself in similar situations and blocking out people from my life makes me feel better. I don't like leaving my room because I feel unsafe around others. I'm literally dying internally and by avoiding people I think I keep getting worse, because I feel like no one likes me.

I first became depressed at 15 and I'm currently 19. I've known since 15 that I one day I'll commit suicide. It just becomes harder each year to carry on, I'm just broken inside and can't seem to get out of the cycle of depression and other issues that I have.
I'm in the same position, at the beginnning of the year I was hoping to make through this entire year but now I've given up hope and nothing matters anymore. I can feel the end coming soon...

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like I have the constant need to runaway from places because no one understands and I get frustrated...
WRITING.TEXT: I've always wanted to runaway from home and now I'm at uni and want to runaway from that too. It's not that I don't like both places but things just get too much for me and running away always comes to mind and feels like the ideal way to deal with my issues. Any advice/supportive messages

The only reason I smile is so that people don't constantly ask me what's the matter. I think it's just a lot of things that build up. I have a lot of trust issues and I never tend to stay in a friendship for long and I feel like I'm always a burden. I want to do my degree but at the same time it doesn't matter for me because I know that I will die soon anyway. Things just get worse rather than better.
This happens to me and I end up having a breakdown.

I'm in the same position. I always lose my friendships because of my mental health, so I don't really get excited meeting new people because I know that the relationship isn't going to last long. I've been isolating myself for a while now and want to die so fucking bad but haven't been able to do it. I wish that I could just disappear from this world.
I thought that I was the only one :)
mood 24/7
It's better to have one friend that understands you completely than have lots of friends and feel like you can't talk to them about your problems.

Same here. I always feel alone and need someone to talk to about my issues and know that they're going to be there for me. I bottle things up so much and it gets me angry and frustrated because I can't get things off my chest :(
I understand completely. Take care of yourself and if you can't carry on then you know whats best for you...
Yep it sucks. I've been dealing with this for the past four years...
So true. I'm back home from uni and my mum is nagging me to get a summer job and all I want to do is cry all day and not leave the house. Then she complains that I'm not doing anything...
Same here. I actually enjoy working but at the moment I am going through a really rough patch and can't get myself to do things.

WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone also cry in the shower?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi everyone, Sometimes I just like to go in the shower and cry when things get too much. Also its sometimes an excuse when I'm really upset and I don't want to cry infront of people. Just wondering if anyone else does this?
This happened a lot in my first year of uni. Just wanted to stay in bed and cry, couldn't face the world at all because I didn't want to fake being happy.
Same. I like to sit down in the shower and just let the water run down me :)
Exactly! I hate having to mask my pain infront of others.

Saw your post and so glad someone else has experienced this. I'm at home for summer now but when I was at uni I self harmed a lot, basically on a daily basis and multiple times a day. During this period I hardly ate because I didnt want to see anyone so I wouldn't go to the kitchen. I just didn't want anyone so see my arms covered in bandages and I felt very self-conscious. I wore long sleeves but it was noticeable that there was something wrong so I didn't want people asking me questions. I wouldn't leave my room unless to go to the bathroom because I didn't want people to see me like this. Now that I'm at home, I have still been self-harming but I eat because its my family so its different. They don't know that I self harm but it doesn't feel as patronising.
Relatable :(
Okay, I'll cry for you :)
Yep you can hide your tears in the shower. Guess it's cost effective too :)
I like to go for walks by myself during the night. There's no one around and its the best feeling.
It's only when you kill yourself that people realise that it wasn't an act and that you were suffering.

Personally I don't know anyone else who does the same shit I do, but I'm so glad its not only me. I feel like people would think I'm even more fucked up if I tell them that I don't leave my room for days. I do the same thing where I just eat whatever I have in my room so I can avoid people when I'm at my lowest point in life. It gets so bad that I have to check whether anyone else is in the kitchen before going in because I don't want to interact with them. When I have nothing to eat in my room I can go through days starving because in my mind I can't leave to get food because I would panic that someone will notice that something is up.

The worst is people asking what I've been up to because I know that when I get really depressed that all I do is cry and self-harm. Its such a hard question to answer when you're not in a good place and you want to have minimal contact with people. Normally my personal hygiene is good, which is probably the only thing that I'm good at maintaining. But yeah it can get bad when I don't leave my room and haven't got the will to do anything.
Sometimes I just get in fits of rage where the slightest thing annoys me.
Same :(
I would be annoyed about that too. Some people just piss me off so much, its like them being near me just gets me frustrated.

I always want to disappear forever because I'm pretending to be happy just for other people. I'm broken inside and nothing is ever going to cure that. Even if I become happier one day , I know that I will never be OK because I've been hurting for so long and no matter how much therapy that I get I will end up killing myself one day. My whole life just revolves around self-destruction. I ruin everything all the time and I don't really care that I do because I've given up on life a long time ago and I'm only still here to show that I might be coping. Its just the same repetitive shit everyday. I'm fed up of life and feeling like shit all of the time.
People like to look at the brightside :(
me everyday :( #8203; I hate doing it but I can't help it...

Totally relatable. It's like I have just put in all the effort and speaking to someone about my issues hasn't changed my behaviours at all. I feel like everything is down to me and anything that my therapists advice doesn't end up working anyway, so its just a complete waste of time for me.

Same here. I have become so used to struggling and being either angry or upset in life that whenever something good happens I ultimatley wreck it. I think that I have become comfortable feeling like shit that any improvement just doesn't feel right. I feel like I purposely go out of my way to fuck things up again because I'm so self-destructive and have been for a long time, its a normal behaviour for me.

I push people away as well and fuck up relationships. Luckily my friends are loyal and accept the issues that I have. Its really hard to stop being so self-destructive and I just hope that I will stop at a point in my life where I'm more comfortable with the issues that I have and can cope better. To be honest, I would just say explain to your friends and family and hope that they will understand in some way. But people don't understand that having depression and BPD is really hard because there are times where I cannot control what I do, its sort of an impulse.
I know right. Just when I think that I'm not going to do it anymore it happens again. Thanks for the supportive :)

I was doing okay for like a week, which was quite impressive for me. But now for like the past four days I've been having breakdowns and self-harming again. This cycle never ends for me and whenever it comes back I become more suicidal. Why can't I just be happy? It frustrates me so much that I will never go back to how I was before my mental health fucked me over. This life is so shit...
Same here, it sucks.

I'm literally in the same position. Started therapy not long ago and I know that I have a long road ahead of me. Wish you all the best in your journey and if you ever want to chat let me know. I don't know anyone that has been through the same thing as me and I don't feel comfortable talking about it with people since they wouldn't understand what it feels like if they hadn't been through it. Same, I have become more anxious and paranoid and I tend to hide away in my room, but then I just get more depressed. I hate my life.

This happens to me a lot. I usually end up smashing things up/breaking things or punching things which isn't any good because it makes feel like shit. I still need to learn how to control my anger because when I get into fits of rage I can't seem to calm down.
Same. I've given up on life...
You're not the only one. Stay strong :) Going through this as well, it's been going on for a long time. Maybe reach out to someone.
As long as you don't stab yourself, do whatever takes your mind off it. I get this urge as well to stab myself and there are times where I stab a cardboard box out of frustration. It actually helps.

Any form of abuse is hard to deal with. There should be no comparision amongst victims because each experience is different but can still affect people in the same way. Sorry you had to hear that, hope you're okay :)

Sometimes its better to take a step back and take time out for yourself. You can take a year out if things are getting too much because if your mental health is not in a good place then you're not performing to your best. If you start therapy and come back after a year then you may feel more motivated and have things more planned out. All the best in whatever you decide to do :)

WRITING.TITLE: Been crying for the past fews day for no reason
WRITING.TEXT: Life is shit. I was fine for like one week and it felt great but now I'm not okay again. I fucking hate myself!
I feel like everything gets overwhelming at times and then I just have a breakdown.
Thank you :)
Same for me :(
I've had depression since 15. I'm so tired of life.
Join the club!

I had to because the university said that I need help. Did see a therapist but nothing worked and been kicked out of uni temporarily because they don #8217;t know what to do with me. Not sure what to do because I need to get better in order to be allowed back at university. Any suggestions?

Yeah I #8217;m been very emotional lately and cry almost everyday. Before I didn #8217;t cry in public, I could hold it in and act like I #8217;m okay but not anymore. I feel like now it #8217;s got to a point where I can #8217;t handle anything.
Same for university. I feel like dying every night but then I just get on with things the next morning. What #8217;s happened to make you feel like this?

I really struggle with this too. I had a clean streak of like a month, then I broke it and my self harm hasn #8217;t occurred that often but last week got really upset because I was kicked out of university and ended up cutting both arms and my stomach. Made me feel like shit. Hope you #8217;re doing okay :)
Happens to me all the time. My mum irritates me when she #8217;s talking or just doing something that makes some noise and my head is over thinking.
Literally.
Never knew other people experienced this too. Time goes too fasts for me and I feel like I #8217;m running out of time to do things. It gets me really anxious and irritated :(
Unfortunately I can #8217;t go through with it

I hardly hear from my so called friends unless I message them first too. It hurts because I suffer from depression and even though I isolate myself my friends do know that I have issues and some of them know that I self harm. I have no one to talk to about my problems and my mum said I can talk to her about anything but I find it really awkward and some things I just don #8217;t want to mention to her. Life sucks

Yeah will do that. In a way going I knew that I had rushed into going back to university and that I wasn #8217;t any better than before. Kinda glad that I #8217;m not there at the moment but I need to have a schedule because I have too much free time now. Hopefully I will be able to get my head round things and also go to therapy. Thank you for the support :)
Same but I feel like if I complain too much everyone is going to say just get on with things.
I can relate
I know it gets so stressful at times

I really hate my anger because it can get out of hand pretty quick. It #8217;s got me in trouble before and I feel like whenever I get angry nothing good happens and I either break something or punch the shit out of something. Then I may cry afterwards because I don #8217;t know why I have to be that way.

Pretty much in the same boat. Have really bad insomnia but I #8217;m kinda used to it since I #8217;ve had it for the past five years. My depression had gone from bad to worse within a matter of weeks. Struggled a lot last year at university from personal issues but also I felt like I didn #8217;t fit in there and didn #8217;t really have a circle of friends that I could rely on or talk to when I was feeling down. Been suicidal for a while but never have the guts to completely go through with it. I feel like I just need someone who I can vent out to if I #8217;m angry or sad. I get very emotional which makes me feel that people don #8217;t like me so I tend to isolate myself. I haven #8217;t been happy for a long time but I try to go through each day. Think I #8217;m on the verge of a breakdown anytime soon. The last one I had was last week which didn #8217;t end very well...
Yep it #8217;s fucking shit
Nice! One of my favourite movies :)
Same. My life is becoming more of a mess each year. I get angry all the time and hate myself for being this way. Being constantly scared frustrates me because I can #8217;t be normal.
This happens all the time to me. I have very few friends and when I don #8217;t see the ones that I #8217;m close with for a while I get depressed and I also have episodes of mania.
So trippy
Story of my life...

I struggle to maintain relationships too. For me I have a lot of trust issues and I #8217;m very picky with whom I become close with. I can know a lot of people but only consider a few my friends because I pick them out and specifically. It #8217;s weird to explain. When I get really depressed I just isolate myself. I tend to only talk to two close friends.
For me too.
I need this
Same for me. It gets worse as I get older and I #8217;m afraid that I will not be able to fix it since it #8217;s been going on for so long.
Describes me
I need this
Tell me about it
Same here I become completely reckless
Yep for the past two weeks been getting more out of control. Keep getting really manic and then severely depressed.
I thought I was the only one who did this
Same. I #8217;ve been low for the past week or so

WRITING.TITLE: Ended up in a amp;e
WRITING.TEXT: So self harmed and the ambulance took me to the hospital. Was put in the mental health unit for a bit and was assessed. My mum came to pick me up I feel so bad now.
Yeah came home from the hospital my mum came to pick me up. No I don #8217;t have a therapist and now my mum is on high alert

Yes I #8217;m in the Uk. When I was at the hospital they put me in a mental health unit and assessed me, they said they will get back to me and arrange therapy. Okay thank you :) I #8217;ll give it a go

I #8217;m 19 too and have the same feeling People keep telling me that I #8217;m still young and can still enjoy myself but I feel so disconnected from everyone else my age because of what I had experienced. It #8217;s tough but I #8217;m trying to get through it, you can too :)
I haven #8217;t even started. Is it any good?

Thank you!! I feel like I #8217;m too hard on myself sometimes. My emotions have been getting more and more out of control lately so need to be able to manage them better as I don #8217;t want to completely go off the wall. Same my relationships are really bad atm and it makes me feel so guilty. Thank you for the encouragement :)
It #8217;s so hard to explain too... people don #8217;t understand
Literally me
Spot on
Sorry to hear that. Take care of yourself :) Just don #8217;t be too hard on yourself for relapsing
Same for me...
Sorry for your loss :(
So true

WRITING.TITLE: Impulsive buying
WRITING.TEXT: My mum is annoyed with me because I managed to spent a grand in a month. Can #8217;t even remember what I #8217;ve been buying and it #8217;s so bad. I somehow manage to lose self control and end up buying so many things that are unnecessary and I always tell myself that I won #8217;t do it again but it always happens. Not sure if this happens to anyone else but it gets me frustrated because I can #8217;t seem to save money. When I have money I have the need to spend it. Does anyone have any tips to stop spending so much?

Thank you. The thing I really struggle with is buying things online. Since having a credit card I buy clothes and things online rather than going in the shop. For me I find I buy things impulsively when I #8217;ve had a really bad day and then I look at things online to cheer myself up. Sometimes but rarely I #8217;m able to put things in the basket and leave it. I feel like I shouldn #8217;t own a credit card so that I won #8217;t be able to buy things online. I know it #8217;s a work in progress. I generally feel bad afterwards when buying something that I don #8217;t need.
Yeah I know I just wish that I wouldn #8217;t waste so much money...
Same for me. It #8217;s so annoying to deal with.
Last night for me...

WRITING.TITLE: My mum questions everything I do
WRITING.TEXT: Such a fucking failure. I already feel bad about myself since I don #8217;t do anything beneficial and have no friends. My mum constantly annoys me and doesn #8217;t help with my mental health. I want to move out.
It sucks

My mum only found out because I had to drop out of uni but she only thinks that I was depressed at uni but I #8217;ve had depression for 5 years so it doesn #8217;t matter where I am, I #8217;ll end up feeling depressed again. Sorry to hear that though, it #8217;s hard to talk about especially when you feel like nobody gives a shit. Would you ever tell her?
To be honest I didn #8217;t want to tell my mum. It depends how you think she will react...

WRITING.TITLE: Sad again
WRITING.TEXT: I used to be okay doing stuff on my own but lately I feel that I #8217;m sad because I have no friends and no one talk to. I don #8217;t have anyone who has the same interests as me.

I can be very sociable and I #8217;m able to get on with people very easily, but the last couple years my mental health has worsened and I tend to isolate myself. I hate doing this. I #8217;m going to be 20 this year and I want to meet new people but I don #8217;t know how to approach this...
Shit...

This happened to me and still is to be honest. Was abused from age 13 so throughout my teens spent a lot of time alone and I #8217;ve battled severe depression. I #8217;m 19 at the moment going to be 20 soon and the past year has been so bad, I feel like as I get older I #8217;m losing more and more friends and any new ones that I meet just don #8217;t last. Never thought I would be this affected but I find it harder as I #8217;ve gotten older, I think especially because I #8217;m scared to be in relationships with people so I always isolate myself so no one can get close to me. I constantly want to make new friends but I #8217;m so protective of myself that I sabotage any potential new friendships. Life is shit...
My life.

WRITING.TITLE: Mental illness is a burden
WRITING.TEXT: Fucking hate my mum stupid bitch. I #8217;m 19 turning 20 this year and this week has been a complete fuck up! Been in a amp;e twice, almost got sectioned by police and they did a welfare check on me at home. Well basically been getting worse with depression lately and self harming, and self harmed quite badly so had to call an ambulance twice and police attended too. When police did a welfare check I wasn #8217;t at home so my mum answered and spoke to them. Anyways she #8217;s pissed off at me saying why I #8217;m doing this and that it #8217;s all for attention and I need to grow up. Fuck sake! Like I have a choice to be mentally ill, I wish I wasn #8217;t and I could live a normal happy life but clearly I can #8217;t. Thinking bout moving out now or if I don #8217;t and I end up having more mental breakdowns like this my mum said she #8217;s going to kick me out. I hate her. Hate my life, and I definitely won #8217;t be able to stand this anymore.
Yeah I know I need to be able to sort myself out. I don #8217;t have anyone really for support which is kinda hard. Not sure where to begin, any ideas?

WRITING.TITLE: Why am I still awake
WRITING.TEXT: 5:21 Uk time can #8217;t sleep... There #8217;s no point trying now
Ikr Another sleepless night :)
Same :D
Hopefully

WRITING.TITLE: Arms are covered
WRITING.TEXT: Both arms are covered and my right wrist. Had a pretty shit week but now I #8217;m stressing because need to go work tomorrow and the uniform is a T-shirt. Not sure what to do, don #8217;t want to get in trouble for wearing long sleeve top. Fuck me! Does anyone else have the same issue when it comes to self harm scars?
Not sure at the moment. It #8217;s making me really nervous.
Yeah I do cut in other places because I hate doing my arms since I have to cover them. Really pissed off at myself Too much stress having to hide it from people
I #8217;ll give it a try and see what they say :)
Yeah thank you for the advice :) Hopefully will be able to get away with it
Fingers crossed
Thank you :)
19f literally only leave the house to go work and walk my dog. Life is shit!

WRITING.TITLE: Fuck Scars
WRITING.TEXT: Does anyone ever feel like since their body is covered in scars already they don #8217;t give a shit about stopping because their body already looks messed up. I always end up thinking like that when I haven #8217;t self harmed in a while but still have the urge to do it. Like sometimes I try so hard to not self harm but then I #8217;m like fuck it no one is going to want me anyway because my body looks disgusting. Just fucking ranting...
Yeah I #8217;ve been doing it for 5 years. I used to try and hide scars but now I just don #8217;t care...
Yeah it #8217;s got to that point. I #8217;ve done my stomach plenty of times but I #8217;ve never touched my legs and I don #8217;t want to. Try and keep your stomach cut free :)
Same. I used to not touch my right arm whereas my left arm was always covered in scars. But once I made that first cut on my right arm, it fucked up everything :(
Yeah ikr I hate when people say you need to stop. Believe me if it was that easy I would have... besides I #8217;m so used to it by now

WRITING.TITLE: Relief after self harming
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever I end up cutting myself, even if it #8217;s small, I get a sense of relief and weight lifted off my shoulders. It feels like I release stress that #8217;s built up, and I feel a lot better. I don #8217;t think anything can ever replace that feeling and rush that I get after cutting.
I think I will never stop doing it to be honest
Yeah it #8217;s definitely a hard thing to overcome. I #8217;ve tried to substitute cutting for something else many times but it always fails.
Yeah so true any addiction is bad. To be honest I prefer self harming than taking drugs.
Yeah I can #8217;t even imagine my body without scars now. It #8217;s just the way life turned out I guess...

WRITING.TITLE: My life is a cycle of depression, self destructiveness and anger
WRITING.TEXT: I used to have hope that things would get better. Even when I was at uni for a year, I thought maybe I would be able to achieve some sort of happiness. Didn #8217;t work out and ended up getting kicked out for mental health and self harming. I have nothing to show for my life and all I do is pretty much stay inside and isolate myself because I #8217;ve given up. I get frustrated and have severe anger issues, which tbh are getting worse. I hate myself!

WRITING.TITLE: Can #8217;t eat when I #8217;m depressed
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever I have a severe depressive episode I won #8217;t eat for like 3 days or more. I won #8217;t be able to physically eat as I have no appetite. I feel like I #8217;m struggling more with eating now than I have been before. Any tips on how to eat more?

Yeah... but they thought they couldn #8217;t handle me because I was self harming a lot. I wasn #8217;t failing any classes but I wasn #8217;t really attending that much. Idk it #8217;s annoying though.

Yeah I #8217;m seen a doctor and been to a amp;e a few times and have gotten assessed by psychiatrists, but nothing happens in the end. I was referred to therapy at least 6 times but I haven #8217;t even heard back or anything. At this point I #8217;ve given up...
Yeah I can relate... I purposely prevent it from healing and try to make it worse!

WRITING.TITLE: Miss the attention
WRITING.TEXT: I know what happened was wrong and it #8217;s messed me up pretty bad, but in some ways I miss the attention that came with it. He treated me like nobody had treated me before, made me smile and made me feel special. I would never want to go through that again but nothing comes close to the attention that I had got. I #8217;m almost 20, never been in a proper relationship because I #8217;m too scared and too protective over myself. I want to have close groups of friends also but I isolate myself and tell myself that I #8217;m not worthy. I #8217;m so self sabotaging because as soon as I have the opportunity to date someone or become close with someone I ignore the person and lock myself away from everyone. I #8217;m so empty and I lack any sort of friends or partners.
I know I hate it so much!
Thank you. Trying to stay positive, some days it #8217;s harder than others. Have a great week too :)

I understand completely. Hope things will turn out well for you, it #8217;s so hard to recover. I just want to be able to be in a normal relationship. Feels like everyone else can and I #8217;ve always struggled to trust someone enough. I #8217;ve never really had therapy but looking and hopefully will start soon. I hate when people ask me why I don #8217;t have a boyfriend, it just reminds me.
Thank you for making me feel better :) Don #8217;t hear words like that too often
That #8217;s what I fear. I don #8217;t want to be like this for the rest of my life.
Thank you :)
I #8217;m trying my best, but I don #8217;t know how long that #8217;s going to last. Been suffering already for 6 years, it #8217;s hard to give myself a reason to live.

That #8217;s fucked! Hope she #8217;s okay though, but it #8217;s likely she may suffer from abuse at some point, it #8217;s so sad and disappointing to hear that this child may be suffering. If you fear for her safety you should tell someone. It #8217;s hard to make the right decision though. Sorry you had to go through what you had to in the past, hope you #8217;ve managed to change your life around for the better.

WRITING.TITLE: Depressed and alone
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;ve had depression for 5 years and I never thought that it would take all my friends away from me. As my depression had gotten worse as the years go by, I have become more and more lonely and all my friendships have faded. I have no one to hang out with and talk to. I #8217;m 20 years old (almost) and people keep telling me this should be the happiest time of your life, but my life is a misery. I #8217;m surprised how I manage to get through each day with no one beside me. I want to be able to go out and have a good time but I can #8217;t even try because I have no one to go and do things with. There #8217;s only so much time that you can spend on your own without having the need to have human contact. I #8217;m becoming more delusional and paranoid as time goes by.

I can see where you #8217;re coming from. Everyone will go against you and you don #8217;t want that. It #8217;s hard to decide what #8217;s the right thing to do. It #8217;s the worst thing having an abuser in your family.

I feel you. It #8217;s such a struggle. Some days I wake up and I #8217;m just like what #8217;s the point I know nothings going to change but other days I #8217;m so optimistic. I just want to be able to have a friend to hopefully make my life a bit happier to live. Thank you and good luck to you too!

WRITING.TITLE: Back to cutting
WRITING.TEXT: Relapsed after two months. Last time I cut I ended up in a amp;e. Wasn #8217;t this bad this time luckily. Really fucking depressed at the moment and I know that I will end up doing something stupid. I get extremely destructive when I #8217;m depressed and paranoid. I want to be admitted to hospital, I have no help whatsoever and I #8217;m getting worse. I used to care about the consequences of my actions but I #8217;ve finally given up on that.
Thank you

WRITING.TITLE: Combination of cutting and not eating
WRITING.TEXT: I have this habit whereby when I #8217;m severely depressed I don #8217;t eat and I self harm a lot. Not sure how my body hacks this but it #8217;s definitely not a good combination, too bad that it #8217;s become a habit over the past couple years.

WRITING.TITLE: Constantly depressed because always worried about something
WRITING.TEXT: I just worry all the time and over think things too much. I #8217;ve been depressed for various reasons but lately for the past year everything just depresses me and I can #8217;t seem to find any happiness. It #8217;s either something happens and I get easily upset or I worry about things that may happen in the future. Guess that #8217;s why I stay at home all of the time because I can #8217;t get myself to go out the house for any positive reasons as the world to me just seems too much to handle. I used to have some hope that I will get better, but I #8217;m actually getting worse and I will crack one day and do something really bad because I can #8217;t seem to get anything good out of this world.

WRITING.TITLE: Constantly depressed because always worried about something
WRITING.TEXT: I just worry all the time and over think things too much. I #8217;ve been depressed for various reasons but lately for the past year everything just depresses me and I can #8217;t seem to find any happiness. It #8217;s either something happens and I get easily upset or I worry about things that may happen in the future. Guess that #8217;s why I stay at home all of the time because I can #8217;t get myself to go out the house for any positive reasons as the world to me just seems too much to handle. I used to have some hope that I will get better, but I #8217;m actually getting worse and I will crack one day and do something really bad because I can #8217;t seem to get anything good out of this world.

I get the same feelings too, it #8217;s strange. Sometimes when I #8217;m hungry I make myself something but then I won #8217;t eat that much of it because it makes me feel sick. Been feeling really empty for the past few days as a result of not really eating. I know food would make me feel better but I don #8217;t mind being empty until I start to get dizzy.
It #8217;s hard though. Stay strong
That #8217;s what I fear
Glad I can relate to someone.
Sorry too. Yep same here, you #8217;ll get through it though.
Okay I guess. Didn #8217;t SH yesterday but had a 2 day streak. Still down though... How are you?

Thank you! The urges are so bad, hope I don #8217;t relapse today again. Don #8217;t worry you #8217;ve got this. I know it #8217;s hard, sometimes I have to work so hard to put myself off cutting. Proud of you #10084; #65039;

So true, any day clean is a big accomplishment. It #8217;s good to know that you and other people on this subreddit understand this #128153; Stay strong and I #8217;m here if you need to chat. I always post when I #8217;m feeling really down because this is the only place where I get support and positive comments.

WRITING.TITLE: Finally had a shower
WRITING.TEXT: Managed to have a shower rather than back down and put it off for tomorrow. Feel so clean and happy with myself. Now I #8217;m calm and relaxed. I just really struggle with showering and get anxious thinking about it. How do all of you keep up with your hygiene?
I know people are so understanding here and everyone seems to relate to one another and not judge. Everyone is so nice when they comment. #128153; Hope you have a good night and stay safe.

Yeah I need to get into that routine because I tend to lose motivation to do anything. Also it would be easier to get it out the way without thinking about taking care of my body. When my mental health deteriorates I just can #8217;t get myself to take care of myself, as for most people I guess.
Yeah thank you. Hopefully I #8217;ll have the courage to do that.
Yeah I #8217;ve been improving on that lately, I #8217;ll try to keep it up. Thank you :)

That #8217;s exactly like me too. Sometimes I go through more days without showering. But other times I #8217;m not too bad. Same I stay in the same clothes sometimes up to a week at its worst. That #8217;s great so proud, it #8217;s tough but I feel like each time we shower it #8217;s an achievement!

I completely understand sometimes I feel like we put too much pressure on ourselves in order to change these so called bad habits. It can be overwhelming to change so drastically without small steps so sometimes I manage to tell myself that I need to take it easy and stop stressing out. I struggle with brushing teeth as well but showering is definitely the worst. I find that listening to music while showering calms me down and makes me feel as it #8217;s not such a big task to do. It definitely helps even when I try to force myself to shower, listening to music uplifts my mood. I #8217;ve never tried showering without the lights on, personally I don #8217;t think it would work with me, but I #8217;m open to new ideas. Thank you for your support, and stay strong!
Thank you so much :)
That #8217;s good to know that I #8217;m not alone :) Hope you #8217;re staying strong too!
Yeah it #8217;s worse when I put it off for longer because then I tend to not care at all. That #8217;s great, very proud of you :)
Don #8217;t worry, you #8217;ll be able to do it soon! I #8217;ve been there before and I know you #8217;ll have the courage to go through with it. Don #8217;t put yourself down, stay positive :)

I know right. Even when I #8217;m having my happier moments I #8217;ve gotten into this habit. Yeah I mean I don #8217;t really go out much either way because I get too anxious, so my motivation goes down to shower and take care of my hygiene. Thank you :) Hope you #8217;re taking care of yourself too as much as possible. Any progress is great!
So true, I #8217;m glad I didn #8217;t put it off too because I feel like I wouldn #8217;t have done it today. Thank you #128156;
That #8217;s cool, I should try it out see if it helps. Anything to calm me down :)
Not sure really, I just get too overwhelmed and when my mental health gets really bad I overthink things and lack a sense of self care.
That #8217;s good! Yeah I know what you mean my thoughts are racing when I #8217;m in the shower for some reason. You could try that and see if it helps :)

That #8217;s really helpful thank you :) I need to get into some sort of routine even if it #8217;s just for a few hours a day so I can take care of myself better. Trying not to be too hard on myself. Take care of yourself #128156;

That #8217;s okay, think of it as a success for yourself. I can go a week or two without showering, so I know how hard it can be. Maybe in the future it could improve for you, but you #8217;re still managing to take care of yourself in small steps. And I know times can be hard, everyone goes through their own struggle. Stay safe and strong :)

Yeah that #8217;s true, I don #8217;t really struggle with body image issues. But I understand it can help a lot of people. Definitely helps, whenever I manage to have a shower I try and motivate myself to wash my hair as it feels like a greater achievement. I tend to wash my body first but normally when I first get into the shower I just will let the water run down me for a bit, and it manages to calm me down. Then I get on with properly washing myself because I don #8217;t know the next time I would get the courage to take a shower again.
I only do it when I #8217;m home alone to be honest! :)

I do feel really refreshed after having a shower and it does boost my self esteem too. I do feel dirty and disgusting after not having a shower for a while but sometimes I just can #8217;t get myself to have a shower. And when I have manage to have a somewhat good hygiene streak it makes me more confident too. Thanks for the advice :)
Stay strong :)
Lol, anything to pass the time :) Well hair grows back either way, I #8217;m sure it doesn #8217;t look too bad
I can relate. Sometimes I just want to get out of the shower as soon as possible because I don #8217;t like it but other times I do feel relaxed.
Thanks, you #8217;ve cheered me up :)

Same, I only tend to wash my hair and body when I become really itchy and I can #8217;t stand it. That #8217;s like me too I get optimistic to shower again the next day or so but then it doesn #8217;t happen. That #8217;s true when you only have to stay at home you let things slip even more. Hope you #8217;re staying safe :)
Something I #8217;m still yet to do. It seems like a good idea to schedule things but I #8217;ve never got round to it. Thanks for giving me motivation to do that #128156;
Great! Thanks for the the tip :) Didn #8217;t even think about that.

WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m an anxious mess
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m a complete wreck and don #8217;t know what to do. Don #8217;t know how things got so bad. HELP PLEASE!

F 20 Same here. I #8217;ve struggled with depression throughout my teen years and I still struggle now. I #8217;ve lost all my friends and either I can #8217;t be bothered to make new ones or I just know that I will end up loosing them so there #8217;s no point. I have interests but I #8217;m never able to pursue them for long which makes me upset, it #8217;s so frustrating because people my age are having the time of their lives and I #8217;m not doing anything and I know that I #8217;m going to be alone forever. I understand completely, it #8217;s so hard to move on to the next chapter of your life since depression practically ruined the most important years. All I can say is stay strong and try get out there more ( something I should tell myself) and hopefully you will be in a happier place where you can enjoy yourself. It #8217;s going to be tough though, the world is a scary place especially if you don #8217;t have friends. First step is to make new friends through mutual interests or maybe reopen past friendships. All the best! X

WRITING.TITLE: Urge to cut badly
WRITING.TEXT: I haven #8217;t cut in a number of months (4 months roughly) but I #8217;m feeling such an urge that I have to do it. I haven #8217;t got any razors at home only a Stanley knife. Since I #8217;ve been back at work for the past couple months I #8217;m trying so hard not to cut by I can #8217;t resist. I won #8217;t cut on my arms but there #8217;s plenty other space. This cycle is never ending!! Urghhhh

Thanks for the recommendation, will download it and give it a go. Thanks I #8217;ll try to stay strong even though it #8217;s hard sometimes. Sorry for the late response sometimes I #8217;m inactive for a while. All the best to you too x it #8217;s great that you #8217;ve been clean for such a long time I hope I can reach that stage too at some point in my life
Thanks for the support x

WRITING.TITLE: Don #8217;t talk to my mum about anything
WRITING.TEXT: I have so many problems and have had severe depression for the last five years. I #8217;m working and still living with my mum but I was at uni for a year, then was forced to take a year out due to mental health issues. I haven #8217;t talked to my mum at all about my issues and haven #8217;t had therapy since I #8217;ve left uni. I want to go back to uni but I know it will be a risk because I may become more depressed and destructive like before. I want to get back into education but I know that my mental health will affect it as I have highs and lows all the time for the past five years. I know it sounds kinda dumb but how do I tell my mum all this? Help please...

WRITING.TITLE: Crying in the shower
WRITING.TEXT: Had a complete breakdown today. Can #8217;t deal with anything anymore. I always become destructive when I lose control. Hate life!
Thank you. Sorry for the late reply, doing a bit better now but I did self harm a bit earlier. Thanks for the support and hope you're doing okay :)
If only it was that easy! :D
Same here. Sometimes I just feel like I keep myself alive for the few people around me in my life. Most of the time I just wanna disappear for good. Hope you're okay though

That #8217;s an achievement, congratulations for not self harming for almost 6 years x There are going to be times where it #8217;s harder. I #8217;m currently self harm free since January but I still get urges at times. Just remember you have coped for the past 6 years without self harm, so you have come up with coping mechanisms over that time which has let you to resist the urge. If you want you can go on these subreddits Adult self harm Self harm Stop self harm These are the one I use, check them out see if they can help. All the best xx
Yeah that #8217;s true, thank you for adding that :)

WRITING.TITLE: Advice on anti- depressants
WRITING.TEXT: Hi Everyone, I've had depression on and off for the past 5 years but I have never been on anti-depressants. Partially because I haven't had much contact with mental health teams and also whenever anti- depressants were mentioned, I always said that I would refuse to take them. Well, I'm seeing a new private psychiatrist and I'm pretty sure that he will prescribe me some medication. I'm very skeptical about that and I just wanted to get some advice from anyone that has used anti-depressants in the past or presently. I am concerned about side effects or if they even help, since I've read that they can have adverse/negative affects. Let me know your thoughts, thank you.

That's great to hear that you have had a positive experience with medication. I feel like now I'm more open to trying some sort of medication to help with my mental health issues, but I'm just very cautious and quite anxious because I'm not sure how they will make me feel. But I've got to a point where my mental health has slightly improved over the past 6 months, however the last couple of years have been really bad and my mental health worsened to a point where I was suicidal and not sure whether I was going to pull through it. I don't want to go back to that state though.

Phone calls definitely terrify me. If I see my phone ring, I tend not to answer it, unless it #8217;s someone like my mum. I will eventually call back but that #8217;s when I #8217;ve prepared myself. I hate people calling me though. The mail that terrifies me are letters from like my mental health team or GP, I hate opening them. I will leave them lying for days until I open them because I feel like there is going to be bad news in the letters.

WRITING.TITLE: Hit myself in the head
WRITING.TEXT: I just hit myself so hard on the head because I got frustrated. Literally it was over nothing, I get so angry for no reason, I just can #8217;t seem to control my emotions at all. I #8217;ve self harmed three times by cutting since the last time I spoke to my psychiatrist. Does anyone have any advice or able to suggest something that will ease my anger and let me calm down. I hate not being able to control my temper, it #8217;s shit. I can #8217;t do anything right.
Yes sometimes I try to, but it just means that I put it off for a bit and then I will end up harming myself anyways. It #8217;s an annoying cycle.
Thank you for your kindness. Sometimes it feels like I #8217;m a complete letdown because I always end up going back to my old ways.
Can relate , it #8217;s so bad though
Thanks :)
Yes nothing else tops that feeling.
Thank you :) All the best to you too

I do the exact same thing. Sometimes I will be crying and pick up a razor to cut but then I won #8217;t be able to do it. Sometimes I think I #8217;ve come so far so why should I hurt myself again, but then at some point I can #8217;t resist the urge. Thank you for the advice and support. Hope you #8217;re doing okay and all the best for you too.

WRITING.TITLE: Overspending
WRITING.TEXT: I can #8217;t help myself when it comes to overspending. It #8217;s definitely one of my worse traits. I used to spend a lot of money on clothes and shoes but I have stopped doing that and that hasn #8217;t happened in several months, which I am really proud of. I don #8217;t even go online to browse. However, I #8217;ve spent #163;600 within the last two weeks, which is excessive for me. Okay some of it has been on therapy, which is definitely usual and something that I need. I have also spent a lot of that money on food like takeout where I #8217;ve just been too lazy to go to the shop and go grocery shopping so that I can cook myself something. I tell myself that it #8217;s not a problem though since I #8217;m spending money on food which is a necessity. I hate having to justify my spending though and I can #8217;t help myself from spending too much money. This is really bad, I #8217;m going to end up in debt at some point which I really don #8217;t want. DAE have advice on spending?

Sometimes I will just buy food unnecessarily, like even if I have cooked something, I will still end up buying food afterwards. I do try to stop myself from buying larger portions when ordering takeout, which does sometimes work. Yeah if I listen to music I find it much easier to be able to cook something. I struggle to get myself into the kitchen in order to cook which is annoying, I'm not sure why this happens to be honest. When I'm in the kitchen and start preparing food then I will go through with cooking. Sounds like a good idea, I will buy some snacks to reward myself with and see if that helps. Thank you for the advice and support, and hope you are doing well.

Not great to be honest, I don #8217;t get much emotional support basically just rely on myself to get through things. Yeah I know, I need to stop doing it but I can #8217;t help myself. Thanks for sharing too, hope you #8217;re getting some level of emotional support from someone.

WRITING.TITLE: Lied to my psychiatrist about my SH
WRITING.TEXT: So basically, I told my psychiatrist that I hadn #8217;t self harmed since January this year, which was true at the time when I saw him. However that was mid September and between then and now I have self harmed more than 5 times through burning and cutting. I spoke to him like a week ago and didn #8217;t mention anything because I don #8217;t want him to know. I feel like I might be getting into this pattern of self harming again. Even though it may not be as bad as before where I used to self harm constantly throughout the day and night, I don #8217;t think it #8217;s a good thing for me to get back into doing it because I know soon it will consume me again and I don #8217;t want that to happen. I kinda want to keep it a secret though but I #8217;m afraid that if I end up in a amp;e then he will find out as well as other people.
That #8217;s the thing I don #8217;t really have anyone that I could talk to about this apart from him. But I really don #8217;t want him to find out that I lied to him about it.

Yeah sounds like a good idea, I might give it a try. I #8217;ll say that I #8217;ve had recent urges and if he asks directly then I might have the courage to tell him that I did self harm or maybe now. Thank you for the advice and wish you all the best too :)

Yes okay I will do that. I want him to help me but I #8217;m just afraid about what he will say when he finds out that I had self harmed recently. Hopefully it will be okay. Thank you for your help :)

Story of my fucking life. Feel for you, kinda shit to hear that someone else is going through the same thing as me. The worse thing is seeing other people that you know be in a stable relationship and knowing that things won #8217;t be the same for you. I hate this shit.

That #8217;s the worst, people really don #8217;t understand anything. It just pisses you off even more if someone says something like that. Hope you #8217;re doing okay though, I know how tough it can be. I don #8217;t actually know anyone in real life who has the same problems as me with relationships of any kind and it frustrates me when someone says why you aren #8217;t in a relationship or that you don #8217;t hang out with friends. Just puts me down even more. Hate it.

Yeah same here, I tend not to talk about relationships with anyone anymore only with my psychiatrist if I feel the need. I understand the ups and downs with this disorder is constant which is extremely frustrating. That was exactly me in my late teens I started to realise something is definitely not right. I mean I had severe depression but I knew it had to be something else. I know right at least with the diagnosis of bpd I actually can justify why I #8217;m the way I am with relationships especially. I mean having the answer is a relief but how to live with it is still a struggle. I used to say that I hated people but I just have a lot of trust issues which affects everything. I mean I get on with people but I spend most of the time on my own because I find it more comfortable.

WRITING.TITLE: Fuck bpd
WRITING.TEXT: I fucking hate having this disorder. I can #8217;t control anything and I #8217;m so fucking alone. I hate crying for no reason and if someone is there trying to explain to them why I #8217;m crying when I don #8217;t know myself. I hate having no friends and no prospects of ever having a relationship. I hate being so self destructive that it can potentially ruin my life by actions which are impulsive and which make me feel like shit afterwards. I hate having to explain to people why I am the way I am, why I can #8217;t have close friends or intimate relationships, why I seem to fuck up just about anything and ruin any good chances that come my way. I hate having to frequently go to the emergency room for self harming and getting asked why I do it. I hate the fact that whenever I have an injury, cut or bruise that wasn #8217;t caused by self harming, that I have to try and convince that individual or group of people what had happened. I hate my life. I #8217;m getting worse and that scares me. I am dissociating more than ever and nothing seems real anymore. Sorry about the rant I #8217;ve just had several bad days but today is the worst by far. Hope everyone else is doing okay though.
Thank you :) I know I had a bit of a mental breakdown. Haven #8217;t been thinking straight at all lately.

I feel like I have them too often. I hope so, I mean I want to be able to move forward with things. Sometimes I feel like when I have my meltdowns I #8217;m going backwards rather than forward with my mental health. Thank you, you #8217;ve put a smile on my face which is something that I really needed :)

Thank you relating with what I'm saying. I know I feel like I'm just going to get through life alone, it's frustrating. I understand, I mean the amount of chances that I have had and I tell myself that I won't mess up this time, but eventually I always do. Then it makes me feel like shit again. It's so difficult living like this. Hope you're doing okay and keeping well :)

Same as me I always do things that I regret later and that damage me. Sometimes I feel like I know better but other times I just can #8217;t seem to stop myself from doing something stupid. Thank you I mean it #8217;s a work in progress. Hope you #8217;re doing good?

I used to self harm constantly but thankfully I don #8217;t do that anymore. I can relate I try to tell myself too that self harm is not going to work, and the idea of self harm is not very appealing to me anymore. But now I self harm out of impulse. Same here, it #8217;s so tiring. I mean I want to stop for myself not others, so now I hide it more just so people don #8217;t find out because it #8217;s frustrating dealing with people #8217;s opinions. They always say that they are disappointed which annoys me and makes me want to cut more tbh.
That #8217;s exactly like me, then people don #8217;t believe that I #8217;m fine when I tell them.

Really proud of you! Keep up the hard work :) I should really do that too but when I #8217;m having a bad episode and become impulsive and destructive I will take stuff even though I get paranoid most of the time from taking drugs now.
Best music too. Listen to peep all the time. Love the little fire, need one of them :)

WRITING.TITLE: Apparently I don #8217;t need meds
WRITING.TEXT: So spoke to my psychiatrist today because my therapist said that I should consider medication. He was explaining what I could go on, but then we had a deeper conversation and I told him that I had a really shit past week and had been under a section 5 (2) after going to the hospital for self harming and an incident took place. So he said that medication wouldn #8217;t be good for me considering my circumstances. Do any of you get by without taking medication, because I #8217;m not really sure if that #8217;s manageable?

WRITING.TITLE: Put under section 5 (2) for SH
WRITING.TEXT: So I went to the hospital on Monday with self harm injuries and I was eventually taken to the observation ward that they have there. Within 10 minutes I went to the bathroom and had a blade on me and attempted to self harm again, the door was forced open by security and the nurses were just standing there. Was trying to leave because I was so angry, I mean I was a complete mess I wasn #8217;t thinking straight at all, but was restrained by security and they took the blade off me. I #8217;m not surprised that they sectioned me looking back at it, but at the time I was pissed off with them and I attempted to leave several times but failed. I was then watched continuously by security when I was sitting down and then when I got up to go to the toilet etc. I don #8217;t even know what happened, I feel like the past number of days are a complete blur to me, I mean I ended up in hospital three times in a row, the first time I left and the police was contacted so they took me back. They I was discharged and went home, within a couple hours I was back in a amp;e and then was sectioned and they kept me for a further two days. I don #8217;t know anymore what to do, I really don #8217;t trust myself. I mean before I used to self harm a lot more consistently, but I feel like now when I do self harm it #8217;s more severe and I have episodes of self harm that can last up to four days or so, but the consequences are much worse than before. I didn #8217;t even register that I was sectioned, I didn #8217;t even react when they told me. I think I #8217;ve lost the battle and I #8217;m not really sure how that happened.
100 % Been listening to peep all night #128293;

Yes that #8217;s exactly what my psychiatrist said, that therapy is the only option for me because the behaviour that I present and my bpd is very severe. I mean I trust him because he #8217;s very experienced, but I #8217;m seeing a new therapist and she suggested medication on my first session, I trust his opinion more though. He said the only way that I will improve or get better in a sense is through intensive therapy.

It was so strange, it was like I reached a completely different level. I #8217;ve never been that bad, it was like it wasn #8217;t even reality, it didn #8217;t sink in until like a day later where I was and what had happened. I feel like I #8217;m losing my shit a lot more now and I will not remember like 3 days, where I #8217;m so destructive and impulsive. I act like nothing even happened. It #8217;s so frustrating, I mean I thought I was getting better but clearly not. Thank you #128153; Hope you #8217;re doing okay too, all the best

That #8217;s what he said, at the moment my mood is so shit and I #8217;m very unpredictable. He also said that if he did prescribe meds, he would think that I would likely take an overdose, he definitely doesn #8217;t trust me at the moment with how I #8217;m behaving.

I mean I #8217;m definitely unpredictable there #8217;s no doubt about that, I don #8217;t even trust myself. But I mean I wouldn #8217;t OD, I #8217;ve never done that before and I #8217;m not suicidal I #8217;m just a mess and on the edge, but I #8217;m like that all of the time.
Having BPD on my file just feels like a curse when I go hospital.
I know it frustrates me so much. People really don #8217;t understand, some comments that I get at hospitals just make me worse and angry.
